business.name: Canal City BBQ
business.tagline: Authentic BBQ Catering for Your Special Events
business.description: Slow-smoked perfection served with pride. From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we bring the authentic taste of BBQ to your doorstep.

hero.title: Canal City BBQ
hero.subtitle: Authentic BBQ Catering for Your Special Events
hero.description: Slow-smoked perfection served with pride. From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we bring the authentic taste of BBQ to your doorstep.

about.title: About Canal City BBQ
about.subtitle: Serving authentic BBQ with passion and tradition

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded with a passion for authentic BBQ, Canal City BBQ has been serving the community with mouth-watering, slow-smoked meats and traditional sides. Our commitment to quality ingredients and time-honored cooking methods ensures every bite is a memorable experience.

features.title: What Makes Us Special
items: Family recipes passed down through generations
Full-service catering with setup and cleanup
Customizable menus for any event size

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Authentic BBQ favorites that will make your event unforgettable

items.name: Brisket
items.description: 12-hour smoked beef brisket with our signature dry rub

items.name: Pulled Pork
items.description: Tender pork shoulder smoked low and slow

items.name: BBQ Ribs
items.description: St. Louis style ribs with house-made BBQ sauce

items.name: Smoked Chicken
items.description: Half chickens rubbed and smoked to perfection

items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy three-cheese mac with crispy breadcrumb topping

items.name: Coleslaw
items.description: Fresh cabbage slaw with tangy dressing

items.name: Baked Beans
items.description: Slow-cooked beans with molasses and brown sugar

items.name: The Starter (10-15 people)
items.description: Choice of 2 meats, 2 sides, rolls, and sauce

items.name: The Crowd Pleaser (20-30 people)
items.description: Choice of 3 meats, 3 sides, rolls, and sauce

items.name: The Big Event (50+ people)
items.description: Full menu options, setup, serving, and cleanup

items.title: Corporate Events
items.description: Impress your clients and colleagues with authentic BBQ catering for meetings, conferences, and company celebrations.

items.title: Weddings
items.description: Make your special day even more memorable with our wedding catering packages and professional service.

items.title: Private Parties
items.description: From backyard gatherings to milestone celebrations, we bring the BBQ experience to your home.

items.title: Full Service
items.description: Complete catering service including setup, serving staff, and cleanup - just enjoy your event!

items.title: Delivery & Pickup
items.description: Convenient delivery options or pickup from our location - we work with your schedule.

items.title: Custom Menus
items.description: Dietary restrictions or special requests? We'll work with you to create the perfect menu.

intro.title: Ready to Book?
intro.description: Select a date and time that works for your event. We recommend booking at least 2 weeks in advance for the best availability.

calendar.title: Select Your Date
calendar.note: Book your BBQ catering appointment directly through our calendar

notes.title: Booking Notes
items: Delivery fee may apply based on location
Custom quotes available for large events
